TASK-445E3AEB.title: Write unit tests for PersonService1
TASK-445E3AEB.description: Create PersonService1Test.java in test package. Use JUnit 5 and Mockito. Test all methods of PersonService1 with various scenarios (valid input, invalid input, repository exceptions). Mock dependencies (repositories). Achieve minimum 80% coverage for PersonService1. Follow testing rules from project.

TASK-D93D2C76.title: Write unit tests for PersonService2
TASK-D93D2C76.description: Create PersonService2Test.java in test package. Use JUnit 5 and Mockito. Test all methods of PersonService2 with various scenarios. Mock dependencies (repositories). Achieve minimum 80% coverage for PersonService2. Ensure tests cover the distinct functionality from PersonService1.

TASK-FB1DC0B3.title: Create Bank domain entity
TASK-FB1DC0B3.description: Create Bank.java entity in domain package with fields: id (Long), name (String), address (String), swiftCode (String). Add JPA annotations. Include constructors, getters, setters, equals/hashCode. Follow project rules for entity design.

TASK-4872E7E4.title: Create Person domain entity
TASK-4872E7E4.description: Create Person.java entity in domain package with fields: id (Long), name (String), age (Integer), bankAccount (Bank reference), job (Job reference). Add JPA annotations (@Entity, @Id, @GeneratedValue). Include constructors, getters, setters, equals/hashCode. Follow project naming conventions (PascalCase for class).

TASK-01B2E7B4.title: Create BankRepository interface
TASK-01B2E7B4.description: Create BankRepository.java interface extending JpaRepository<Bank, Long>. Add custom query methods if needed (e.g., findByName). Place in repository package. Add @Repository annotation.

TASK-0147633B.title: Add application configuration
TASK-0147633B.description: Create application.properties/yml with database configuration, JPA settings, and other necessary Spring Boot configurations. Follow infrastructure rules (use environment variables for sensitive data). Add logging configuration with structured format.

TASK-B97F6FAD.title: Implement PersonService1 (first creation service)
TASK-B97F6FAD.description: Create PersonService1.java in service package with @Service annotation. Inject PersonRepository, BankRepository, JobRepository. Implement createPerson method that validates input, creates Person entity with associated Bank and Job, saves to repository, and returns PersonDTO. Add @Transactional annotation. Include proper error handling.

TASK-C98AB0FC.title: Create JobRepository interface
TASK-C98AB0FC.description: Create JobRepository.java interface extending JpaRepository<Job, Long>. Add custom query methods if needed (e.g., findByTitle). Place in repository package. Add @Repository annotation.

TASK-08E4ED7B.title: Create PersonDTO for API communication
TASK-08E4ED7B.description: Create PersonDTO.java record/class in dto package with fields: name (String), age (Integer), bankId (Long), jobId (Long). Include validation annotations (@NotBlank, @Min, @NotNull). Add static factory method to convert from/to Person entity. Follow DTO pattern from project rules.

TASK-F7EAFB56.title: Implement PersonService2 (second creation service)
TASK-F7EAFB56.description: Create PersonService2.java in service package with @Service annotation. Inject PersonRepository, BankRepository, JobRepository. Implement createPerson method with different business logic (e.g., additional validation, different default values, or alternative creation flow). Add @Transactional annotation. Ensure it has distinct functionality from PersonService1.

TASK-ADFA1685.title: Create Job domain entity
TASK-ADFA1685.description: Create Job.java entity in domain package with fields: id (Long), title (String), company (String), salary (BigDecimal), description (String). Add JPA annotations. Include constructors, getters, setters, equals/hashCode. Use BigDecimal for salary to handle monetary values properly.

TASK-B4372E48.title: Add database migration scripts
TASK-B4372E48.description: Create SQL migration scripts for creating Person, Bank, and Job tables. Include proper foreign key constraints, indexes, and data types. Use versioned migration approach (e.g., Flyway or Liquibase format). Place in appropriate resources directory.

TASK-2595F9E1.title: Create PersonRepository interface
TASK-2595F9E1.description: Create PersonRepository.java interface extending JpaRepository<Person, Long>. Add custom query methods if needed (e.g., findByName, findByAgeGreaterThan). Place in repository package. Add @Repository annotation.

TASK-721D6E42.title: Create PersonController
TASK-721D6E42.description: Create PersonController.java in controller package with @RestController and @RequestMapping("/api/persons") annotations. Inject PersonService1 and PersonService2. Implement POST endpoints for each service (e.g., /create-via-service1, /create-via-service2) that accept PersonDTO and return appropriate HTTP responses. Add validation annotations. Follow controller rules from project.

TASK-9E504516.title: Write unit tests for PersonController
TASK-9E504516.description: Create PersonControllerTest.java in test package. Use Spring Boot test annotations (@WebMvcTest). Test all endpoints with MockMvc. Mock service dependencies. Test validation, error handling, and success scenarios. Follow integration testing rules from project.
